channel.title: jacky zhao | personal website
channel.description: Recent content on jacky zhao | personal website

item.description: Contrary to popular belief, I actually things outside of writing questionable code and school. Here are some things that I’m up to nowadays: Reading There’s nothing like cozying up with a cup of hot barley tea on a rainy day with a great book. I’ve recently rediscovered the joy of reading thanks to someone very close to me. Currently Reading Sapiens by Yuval Noah Harari The Art of Thinking Clearly by Rolf Dobelli 21 Lessons for the 21st Century by Yuval Noah Harari Some of my past favourites
